commands.title: Generate contributions for installed extension -> Open Untitled

contributions.sort.description: How to sort items in a table.
enumDescriptions: Use order in which they are defined.

contributions.doOnCompletion.description: What to do on finishing editing README file (after running `contributions.generate` command).

contributions.addStartEndDelimiters.description: Add start and end delimiters to the table.

contributions.alignDelimiters.description: Make pretty table. (Not pretty if the table is big)

contributions.addPadding.description: Add whitespaces between delimiters and content.

contributions.wrapInDetailsTag.markdownDescription: Warp tables in `<details>` tag to look collapsed by default.

contributions.settings.moveOutPrefix.description: Move common extension prefix from the first settings table column. (VSMarketplace has bad rendering for wide tables).

contributions.settings.includeTypes.markdownDescription: Whether to include setting `type` column or not.

contributions.settings.truncateDefaultVa.description: Truncate default value if it's bigger than this setting. (0 to disable).

contributions.settings.truncateDescripti.description: Truncate description if it's bigger than this setting. (0 to disable).
